Volunteer Income Tax Assistance at UCLA

Welcome!
*Please note that we are currently not offering any appointments. Please check back January of next year for our tax site availability. If you have any questions or concerns, please submit them through our contact form.*

VITA at UCLA strives to provide free tax preparation services to the Los Angeles community. Each year we serve around 800 clients and have a volunteer cohort of around 200 students!
